page.title: 18A MODERN FACTORY
page.content: The{British American Tobacco} factory is big, inside it is{automatic.}It looks extremely well planned and it blends in well with its surroundings, they have{planted more than 40,000 {trees and shrubs}to make it blend in. It looked a bit smarter than an ordinary factory because it was so well shaped and painted.What most impressed me was all the{computers that are used for security and things,the factory came to Corby because it was near port Felixstowe, the M1, the M6, Manchester, Liverpool and Southampton.It only{employed 40 {workers}which greatly astonished me,it has only been here about 2 years.The planners obviously care about Great Oakley because there is{no sign at all {of them polluting}the area.I think the factory is making a{good profit.
